text: “A community ceramics studio just opened its doors
provider: offering memberships for {{cost}}/month. The scent of wet clay and the promise of handmade mugs calls to Alex.”

text: “The neighborhood climbing gym drops its monthly rate to {{cost}}. Alex imagines the burn in their forearms and the view from the top of the wall.”
“A retro gaming club sends Alex an invite for {{cost}}/month. Unlimited arcade tokens
costMin: and the glow of CRT screens await.”

text: “A poetry open mic night at the indie bookstore is recruiting regulars for {{cost}}/month. It includes a drink ticket and the courage to share words with strangers.”
“A woodworking workshop offers weekend access for {{cost}}/month. Alex pictures building a bookshelf
provider: or at least learning not to fear the table saw.”

text: “A community choir is holding auditions—no experience necessary
provider: just {{cost}}/month and a willingness to harmonize with strangers.”

text: “A photography club offers darkroom access and monthly photo walks for {{cost}}. Film photography is coming back
“An improv comedy troupe needs new members for {{cost}}/month. Awkward exercises
costMin: and surprisingly deep friendships are part of the package.”

text: “A meditation and sound bath studio offers unlimited sessions for {{cost}}/month. Alex could use some intentional quiet in their life.”
“A cooking class collective runs weekly sessions for {{cost}}/month. Each week is a different cuisine
costMin: and always too much delicious food.”

text: “A language exchange group meets weekly at a café for {{cost}}/month. Alex could finally learn Spanish
costMin: or maybe just make friends who travel.”

text: “A vintage film society screens classics every Tuesday for {{cost}}/month. Think Criterion Collection on a big screen with other cinema nerds.”
“A community bike repair co-op offers membership for {{cost}}/month. Alex gets tools
costMin: and knowledge from folks who actually know what they’re doing.”

text: “A tabletop board game café offers unlimited play for {{cost}}/month. Every week brings new games
costMin: and that particular kind of friendly competition.”

text: “A martial arts dojo opens enrollment for {{cost}}/month. Alex considers discipline
costMin: and the satisfying snap of a well-executed kick.”
